Name: Dungeon Adventure
About the game: About the EA version - A total of 12 professions with different styles, each with its own characteristics -Each profession has 4 exclusive skills, and each skill has at least 3 entry-changing effects. At present, the game has 236 entries and 39 relics - At present, all ten levels of the full version of the game are open, and each level has its own fixed boss. The default mode of the game is simple mode. There are less than 8 entries for monsters. Clear the level on easy difficulty or unlock inheritance to play hard mode. There are 14 monsters. Entries, like players, can trigger entry chains with each other. -30 events, many branches, different options according to different players - 151 available equipment, equipment entries will generate bonuses randomly, and entries change skill effects and combat methods. -39 usable relics (relic system), the effect of relics is valid for the whole team - More than 39 kinds of buff status, supporting and limiting occupations are very important! Any suggestions and feedback about the game can be added to the QQ group: 399987226 According to these combinations, set up your own team reasonably, let each team member have a clear division of labor, some are responsible for attack, some are responsible for taunting defense, some are responsible for assistance, some are responsible for control, and each perform its duties in a balanced development. In dungeon exploration, players will encounter various emergencies, which will produce different results according to the weather, terrain, good and evil values, and team composition of the player that day. When encountering enemies in a dungeon adventure, a reasonable team composition will greatly increase the winning rate of the battle After winning the battle, you can use the various loot to strengthen your team, and you can also use these items to enchant and forge to fully arm your team Finally smash the dungeon completely
Developers: 娱乐至上 Just for fun
